pageDescription: Learn about Healing Earth Design and Sustainable garden and landscape design services.

sections.heading: Our Story
sections.paragraph1: Healing Earth Design was founded on the belief that caring for our natural spaces can be a powerful form of healing.
sections.paragraph2: After experiencing personal loss, I returned to school for sustainable horticulture and landscape design, finding peace and purpose through working with plants, soil, and seasonal rhythms. What began as a way to heal grew into a calling to help others reconnect with the earth in meaningful, practical ways.

sections.heading: Who I Am
sections.paragraph1: I'm Sarah Martin, a sustainable horticulture and landscape design graduate with over six years of hands-on gardening experience. My yard serves as a trial garden where I test plants, observe ecosystems, and refine designs before bringing ideas to clients.
sections.paragraph2: I specialize in plant-forward design—no hardscapes, no unnecessary complexity—just thoughtful, site-appropriate plantings that are beautiful, resilient, and supportive of local ecosystems.

sections.heading: My Approach
sections.paragraph1: I believe in "right plant, right place." Every design begins with assessing the space, listening to the client, and to what will thrive long-term.
sections.paragraph2: Whether you're a beginner gardener or someone looking to deepen your connection to your outdoor space, I meet you where you are and help you grow with confidence.

sections.heading: Let's Work Together
sections.paragraph1: Healing Earth Design serves homeowners who want gardens that feel alive, intentional, and grounded in sustainability.
sections.paragraph2: If you're ready to create a garden that gives back to you and to the earth, I'd love to work with you.
